name: Yugoe

The Yugoe Mission

To arouse and awaken your sensual delights for funâ€” one restaurant, one bar, one lounge and one perfect evening at a time.

The Yugoe Mission is clear and simple; we want to help those people who have ever struggled to find the perfect first date, the best restaurants to celebrate an achievement and who have always wanted a complete evening planned, but have never known where to start. We are here to help you find the right place to go at the right time for the right occasion. We are here to be your personal guide to the city of Los Angeles and its surrounding neighborhoods. We write reviews that come from the heart, not from the corporate notepad; we offer personalized recommendations based on what you ask us to recommended, not some yuppie search engine. We speak how you think, we see what you feel and we plan what you want. We look to our members for help in finding the hidden jewels of Los Angeles. We encourage our members to advertise their business and bands & events on our website to help get their names out and most importantly, our members just arenâ€™t visitors to our site, they are our friends. We assist our friends with it all, from recommending a place to eat to planning the perfect evening to getting them on the guest list to some of the hottest clubs in LAâ€¦we do the same for you. We have a saying here at Team Yugoe…Yugoeâ€¦Itâ€™s where we go…!
